code_value: Surely culture is about how one lives one's life, not the noises we make that is called language. Surely speaking one language — whether it be English or any other language — promotes greater understanding and breaks down barriers. Who really wants to live in a world of 2,000 languages? This makes communication with most of our fellow human beings impossible. Who cares whether it's English, German or Cantonese — the more of us who talk to one another, the better.
